item.title: 40 passengers suffer injuries after private travels bus hit lorry
item.description:
<![CDATA[40 passengers suffer injuries after private travels bus hit lorry
The incident occurred when the truck loaded with tiles was taking a ‘U’ turn and the CGR travels bus which was heading to Kadapa from Hyderabad hit the truck.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 1 February 2025, 11:56 AM
Representational Image
Jogulamba Gadwal: About 40 passengers and a driver suffered injuries when two private travels buses hit a truck at Puluru toll plaza under Undavalli mandal here on Saturday morning.
The...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
